text: In the midst of proposing to Chandler , she cries from sheer emotion , saying , `` There 's a reason why girls do n't do this ! '' Instead , Chandler gets on his knees and proposes to her and Monica says yes . They then open the door to Joey , Rachel , and Phoebe , who have been waiting to celebrate . At first , they hesitate , feeling Ross should be there to share the moment , then decide that after three marriages , Ross can afford to miss one engagement celebration .
